dict.string: on alfred_script(q) set the clipboard to "" & q tell application "iCal" to activate tell application "System Events" keystroke "n" using {command down} keystroke "v" using {command down} keystroke return end tell end alfred_script
(Quick Event is what you get when you press âŒ˜N in iCal for OS X Lion)
Add to iCal via Quick Event: {query}
